i picked up Diablo iv during the summer sale without expecting much. For the last nine years, the only game i really played was counter strike global offensive, so jumping into a top down dungeon crawler wasn't exactly on my bingo card. Turns out i was completely wrong.  For about 30 bucks, i got the standard game plust the vessel of hatred  dlc, and this thing absolutely absorbed me for months. Im talking "where did my free time go" absorbed. The game play loop is insanely fun, the progression is addictive, and somehow it managed to pull me away from opening cs2 cases, which alone probably saved me more money than the game cost.  If you're new to this style of game like i was, I 100% recommend it. It's accessible, satisfying, and way more entertaining than i expected. Now, if you'te hardcore ultra nerd who's furious they didnt get a specific class for free...i guess thats a thing. But here, servers, developers and constant updated definitely dont run on hopes and dreams. Yes that was a joke.  Overall, Diablo IV surprised me int he best way possible, fun, immersive, and reminder that stepping outside your ususal genre pays off...even if it humbles you into realizing you might've been sleeping on something great the whole time.

Blizzard do not give a toss about EU players.  The new season 11 is set to release at 4:30am GMT which shows that they do not give a flying F about EU players.  I will never spend another penny on this game.  Also who in their right mind will pay the same price of a full game for some DLC that should have been in the base game.  There is nothing to the game, just hack and slash at monsters level up, grind against the most ridiculous RNG you have ever seen just to get the slightest of upgrades to your gear.  Oh and then they will release a new season so you can start all over again and pay them more money for the same experience.  Shady trash business practices from Blizzard.  Burning the players that did support them with Vessel of Hatred expansion.  Scum company that want to nickel and dime their player base.  Check most positive reviews have hardly a handful of hours playing and the players who actually play mostly have negative reviews.  Of course the die hard Blizzard meat gobblers will be offended by my review.

증오의 군주 확장팩(2)을 구매하면 증오의 그릇 확장팩(1)을 무료로 준다는 말로 현혹함.  여기서 문제점이 기존 증오의 그릇 확장팩(1) 을 구매한 유저가 증오의 군주 확장팩(2) 만 구매하는 수단  즉, 게임 업그레이드나 확장팩 개별구매가 불가능 하다는 점에서  이것은 기존에 본편과 증오의 그릇 확장팩을 구매했던 유저에 대한 기만입니다.  업데이트 예고에서는 유저들의 피드백을 적극 수용하고, 유저들을 챙기는가 싶었지만 뒤로는 뒤통수를 치는 아주 나쁜 게임입니다.

Really fun if you’re into the lore. Have been enjoying endgame content for several seasons as well. Great for more casual players like me who don’t want to wrestle with PoE PhD-level skill tree.  That being said, Blizzard’s market strategy forces me to leave a negative review. Forcing players to buy vessel of hatred again with the new DLC is absurd. VoH content was mediocre at best [spoiler](you don't even get to fight a proper end boss)[/spoiler]. Only got it on sale. Lord of Hatred looks better, but including another payment for VoH punishes loyal players who already bought it. Unbelieavable,  even for Blizzard standards.

The recent Lord of Hatred expansion has raised serious concerns among players who previously purchased the Vessel of Hatred expansion. With the release of LoH, Blizzard removed VoH from the store and now includes it with the LoH expansion, which is priced at $40. On the surface, that sounds like a great deal, two expansions for the price of one.  However, if you’re one of the players who already bought the Vessel of Hatred expansion, you’re completely left out. There’s no discount for existing owners, no bonus cosmetics, and no store credit. Refunding VoH isn’t an option either and why should it be, when you’re essentially being asked to pay for the same expansion twice?  In practice, Blizzard is forcing prior VoH owners to repurchase content they already own. I was planning to pre-order the Lord of Hatred expansion, but after seeing these shady and anti-consumer tactics, I’ve decided not to. Honestly, that might be for the best.

Blizzard really try to forced me to buy the first DLC twice? This Company is the biggest Scam ever, nice thing i buyed the first DLC one Week ago only to buy it now again with the second DLC... F you Blizzard.
Bundled sales, arbitrary price hikes, and disregard for the rights of long-time players.

I am leaving this negative review to express my absolute outrage regarding the predatory pricing structure for the new Lord of Hatred expansion. As a dedicated player who already owns the base game and purchased the Vessel of Hatred DLC, it is completely unacceptable that the new Lord of Hatred bundle forces me to pay for the Vessel of Hatred content again with absolutely zero discount. This pricing model is a massive slap in the face to loyal fans who supported the game early, effectively punishing us for our previous purchases while the developers attempt to double-dip on content we already own. It is a greedy, anti-consumer tactic that shows a total lack of respect for the existing community, and I strongly urge potential buyers to avoid this bundle until a fair, dynamic discount is implemented for those of us who have already paid for the previous expansion.

I am an old school Diablo 2 player (I clocked it with every class) and I finished Diablo 1, didn't enjoy Diablo 3 at all and I recently bought Diablo IV and I must say, absolutely brilliant game. I'm not sure where the hateful comments come from. It gives you a slight feel but just enough of Diablo 2 but it has 10x better graphics.   A lot of people complained about the storyline, the Diablo IV storyline isn't too bad but yes it isn't like "A plagues tale" or "Cyberpunk2077" but it still isn't bad, Vessel of Hatred on the other hand, storyline was pants.  Overall I will give the game an 8/10, it took me 35 hours to complete the campaign and ding level 60 and another 4 hours playtime to clock the expansion.  Now for the negative:  When I hit level 42 a "unique amulet" dropped and my crackling lightning just 1 shot EVERYTHING, even Lillith the final boss, which I found to be a bit sh*t, like, I don't want to 1 shot the final boss the first time I play the campaign through, and you then realise that with every class, if you spec right, get 1 unique item (spec into what the bonus is for that item), you will 1 shot everything and sometimes 5 - 7 shot bosses. Even starting the game on hard (you cant start higher than hard when creating a new character) I was 1-shotting by level 20 because I spec'd right. That is one of my very very very few issues with the game.  TL;DR: Buy the game, it's worth it for the playtime you get. If you an old Diablo 2 fan, DEFINITELY buy the game.

Лучший из казуальных дьяблоидов. Из неприятного, что ввиду отсутствия идей, просто копируют под соусом чего-то нового механики из 3й части. Хватает наглости так же, к примеру, механику того же куба хорадримов закрывать в ДЛЦ. Так что если хотите фулл эндгейм контент, то покупайте дополнения по цене игры, ну или ждите скидок. На первое дополнение скидка 40% была уже через пол года после его релиза, насколько помню + как видно уже сейчас, можно вообще забить на покупку дополнений (а можно и на игру), дождаться, когда разрабы поймут, что надои с проекта падают, и они выпустят финальный доп, который, вероятнее всего, будет включать в себя все предыдущие.

Mediano ao extremo, jogo pago que cobra por tudo e ainda pisa em qualquer pessoa que seja fã da franquia. E agora com o lançamento da Lord of Hatred a gente volta pro mesmo cenário da Vessel of Hatred, onde se você não comprar a expansão não tem acesso real ao endgame do jogo, sinceramente comprar um jogo pra ter que pagar pra continuar jogando é coisa de FIFA, no geral não recomendo nenhum pouco mas cada um gasta seu dinheiro com o que quer.  OBS: tenho 24h na steam mas tenho mais de 300 no xbox.

Сразу скажу, что я считаю дьябло 4 хорошей игрой, это качественная рпг в которой можно с интересом провести сотни часов, но я против dlc за фул прайс, против пей вол и пей ту вин классов и уж тем более таких вещей как ПРЕДЗАКАЖИ наше дополнение чтобы открыть новый класс сейчас! То есть дополнение ещё не вышло, но ты его купи за фул прайс чтобы уже сейчас поиграть за новый класс. Так что самый большой минус этой игры, это ценовая политика и маркетинг, за что я ставлю палец вниз. На мой взгляд д4 не в том положении среди конкурентов, чтобы заламывать такие цены. Советую брать игру ТОЛЬКО ПО СКИДКЕ 40%. За большее игра того не стоит.
Jogo maravilhoso recomendaria 100% para jogadores.

Diablo IV é um retorno forte às raízes sombrias da série, com um mundo aberto extremamente imersivo e visualmente impressionante. O combate é intenso e oferece grande personalização, com classes bem distintas e árvores de habilidades flexíveis. A campanha é madura e envolvente, impulsionada por uma narrativa sombria e personagens marcantes. O endgame mantém o ciclo viciante de evoluir builds e enfrentar desafios, garantindo muitas horas de conteúdo. No geral, é uma experiência moderna, profunda e fiel ao legado da franquia.

Пусть утонут в отрицательных отзывах и подумают о своем поведении! Введение основного контента за деньги очень некрасиво по отношению к своему комьюнити.   РОЕ 2 даёт весь тебе контент без каких-либо доплат, единожды купив ранний доступ, а в благодарность разрабам ты можешь по своему желанию купить наборы поддержки.   По-моему, выбор очевиден.

Es wird zu wenig erklärt. 3 Sachen stören mich wirklich sehr. Ganz ohne Hilfe ist es sehr schwer das Spiel richtig zu verstehen, da es so viel aufzuwerten und zu berücksichtigen gibt. Schaden kommt nicht nur von Gegnern sondern Hauptsächlich durch die ganzen Schadenseffekte auf dem Boden und in der Luft. Zu 90 % haben mich diese Sachen getötet und nicht die Gegner. Da die Unterschiede zwischen den Qualstufen recht groß sind, sterben z.B. alle Gegner auf Q2 sofort, während auf Q3 es mich immer wieder erwischt, ohne dass ich weiß warum. Teilweise ist das Gewusel auf dem Bildschirm so groß, dass ich noch nicht einmal sofort merke, dass es mich erwischt hat. Immerhin hat man die Kämpfe gegen die Unterbosse und Bosse etwas leichter gemacht. Aber warten wir die nächste Season ab. Wahrscheinlich krempelt Blizzard das ganze Spiel wieder um. Das Spiel (Season) sei zu kurz, lese ich, geschrieben von Leuten die sich berufsmäßig mit Diablo beschäftigen. Finde ich als Solo und Freizeit Spieler nicht. Einzig zum Ende dauert es ziemlich lang bis man weiter levelt. So ab Stufe 240. Auch die unverschämten Preise für kosmetische Sachen finde ich nicht gut. Man hat das Gefühl es geht Blizzard nur ums Geld.

Also ich besitze das Spiel 1. Auf der XBox 2. Auf Steam 3. Im Bnet durch den Gamepass  Dass ich jetzt die Add-on´s 3 mal kaufen müsste trotz Verknüpfung des Account über die Plattformen ist einfach nicht mehr Zeitgemäß. Beim Grundspiel fand ich es noch in Ordnung.  Ich freue mich endlich einen Beutefilter zu bekommen und dass die passiven Skillbäume angefasst werden. Damit könnte Diablo 4 endlich spielbar werden.   Die Hoffnung stirbt zuletzt...

令人失望的贪婪之作——暴雪正在践踏玩家的信任  作为一名从《暗黑破坏神2》发售就一路支持到现在的老玩家，我对《暗黑破坏神4》“憎恨之王”DLC的操作感到震惊和愤怒。这已经不是简单的商业决策问题，而是对玩家群体的公然漠视。  一、赤裸裸的价格欺诈 国区售价从168元突然飙升至278元，涨幅超过65%！而所谓的“新内容”仅有一个圣教军职业，核心资料片内容竟要等到2026年4月29日才能体验。这意味着我们提前一年半为不完整的产品支付溢价，这是对消费者的侮辱。  二、强制捆绑的恶意销售 最令人无法接受的是，新DLC强制捆绑已发售的“憎恨之躯”内容。对于早已购买前代DLC的玩家而言，这等同于强制重复消费。暴雪既未提供独立购买选项，也未对老玩家给出任何补偿方案——这种“付两次钱买同一份内容”的模式，已经触及商业道德的底线。  三、沉默比傲慢更可恨 截至目前，暴雪官方对涨价原因、捆绑销售逻辑、老玩家权益等问题保持绝对沉默。这种“掏钱时迫不及待，售后时装聋作哑”的态度，彻底撕下了暴雪最后的面具。  暴雪的“憎恨之王”真正憎恨的或许不是地狱恶魔，而是自己的玩家。

Not only did Blizzard make the game worse with the newest update, they also revealed that the sale they just had for the Vessel of Hatred DLC was a scam so that you would have to pay around $67 ($27 plus tax for Vessel of Hatred on sale, plus $40 for Lord of Hatred) instead of $40 since the DLCs are bundled together. This is scummy, it does make people feel like they've been scammed, and no one should bother giving Blizzard money every again.   The game, as a whole, is fine. Not as good as previous Diablos, but fine. But Blizzard as a company just continues to get scummier and scummier. They aren't worth spending money on their products. Every game they release is worse than the last one, the updates they get keep making them even worse, and their business practices are proving to be some of the worst out of the big AAA developers right now. Save yourself both time and money, and go try out Path of Exile 2 while it's having a free weekend, and you can spend $30 a full game instead of $40 for just a DLC.  PS: Blizzard thinks their in game skins are worth $25. They are maybe worth $5 at most. Two skins in game cost more than a DLC. It's nonsense.

Took a break from Diablo since release and was excited to buy the new Lord of Hatred expansion for Paladin. Refusing to purchase now in solidarity with a community that is being screwed by predatory DLC practices. Congrats Blizzard, I'm taking my $40 somewhere else.

Diablo 4 is what happens when a legendary ARPG gets dragged into a boardroom, stripped for parts, and reassembled around a cash register. The art is grim, the tone is dark, but the design philosophy is pure corporate daylight robbery. You’re not descending into hell — you’re being slowly shaken upside down to see what falls out of your pockets. Diablo 4 doesn’t feel like a game anymore, it feels like a monetization framework with demons taped on top. The combat is fine, but boring. The visuals are polished, but the soul of the series is gone. What’s left is repetitive gameplay wrapped in one of the most aggressive and shameless pricing models Blizzard has ever pushed.  Compared to Diablo 2 or even Diablo 3, this is a downgrade in spirit. Earlier Diablos respected your time and your purchase. Diablo 4 constantly reminds you that you’re a customer first and a player second. Seasons, battle passes, cosmetics, expansions — every system seems designed to extract more money, not more fun.  The expansion situation is the final insult. If you already bought Vessel of Hatred, congratulations: Blizzard now expects you to pay again when buying Lord of Hatred. No discount. No compensation. No store credit. Just silent removal of VoH from the store and a shiny new bundle pretending it’s a “great deal.” That’s not a deal — it’s anti-consumer.  Meanwhile, Path of Exile 2 is shaping up to offer deeper systems, real build diversity, and a business model that doesn’t treat its players like walking wallets. Titan Quest 2, even before release, shows more respect for classic ARPG design and player ownership than Diablo 4 manages after years of development.

O jogo é bom. Entretanto, a forma como a empresa esta seguindo com atualizações é triste. Atualizar o jogo para ter "novos" poderes, que na verdade só mudam os nomes, não são atuliazações.   Se você nunca jogou outro ARPG, jogar diablo 4 vai ser uma ótima experiência. entretanto, se jogar POE ou POE2, vai perceber que é possível se divertir HORAS ao inves de se frustar por horas. isso sem mencionar a gama de possibilidade para builds.

falar a Verdade o diablo 2 e 3 é superior em vários aspectos ao 4, porem a narrativa desse jogo é incrível e que historia boa pqp, o ruim é que o end game ta muito ruim e  maçante fora que as expansões são salgadas, mas pra juntar a galera e brincar é divertido se tiver uns colegas pra jogar junto recomendo demais o coop desse jogo é muito bom, fora isso é um game da Blizzard então quem sabe sabe.  Diablo 2 - 10\10 Diablo 3 - 8.5\10 Diablo IV - 9\10  Minha opinião sincera.
Lixo pra farmar dinheiro

"O paladino é um desperdício. Porque ele segue com exatidão, o manual de um produto vendido a base de ansiedade e nostalgia. Não é atoa que o paladino seja a primeira classe divina de Diablo IV, porque a Blizzard abraçou a temática do jogo completamente e agora ela se comporta como igreja. Para jogar com o paladino você precisa ter fé, ignorar o histórico de pecados da empresa e confira no dogma do marketing da empresa."  Palavras do ViktorKav em seu último vídeo que trazem a tona o total descaso da Blizzard com seus clientes. Simplesmente chega a ser decepcionante tanto movimento e tanta comoção para um grande evento para ser resumido em 2 minutos de vídeo com o anúncio de vendas.  Pode ser até atrativo para novos jogadores o valor em si, porém, chega ser uma falta de educação a tratativa com jogadores antigos que tratam nosso dinheiro como se fosse nada.  Uma temporada sem conteúdo, uma empresa mercenária e o fim mais próximo.
Serei bem sincero, o jogo não é muito bom! Tipo se vc gosta do genero como eu vai reparar que o jogo é bem fraco e muito enjoativo.

O jogo é uma obra de mediocridade. Qualquer pessoa, até alguém totalmente inexperiente, consegue “buildar” algo nele, tamanha a falta de profundidade. O level design é pobre, a IA dos inimigos é vergonhosa e o jogo simplesmente não oferece desafio real. O endgame é raso, sem propósito, e não prende o jogador por mais de algumas horas. Para piorar, ele está lotado de paywalls. Até mesmo o acesso à nova árvore de habilidades depende de pagar pela expansão, como se fosse algo “premium” quando deveria ser parte do jogo base. É uma piada. No fim, esse jogo é o reflexo do estado atual da indústria: mediocridade elevada à norma, decisões preguiçosas e gente em cargos importantes que claramente não deveria estar ali. Um produto sem alma, sem ambição e sem respeito pelo tempo de quem joga.
Jogo é até bom, mas que empresa mercenária dos infernos. Pode Jogar Poe2, Grim Dawn, Titan Quest, Torchlight 1 e 2, Todos São melhores.  Grim Dawn dá de 10 a 0 e é um jogo bem mais antigo,

Tengo este juego la plataforma de Blizzard junto a la expansion VoH. Quiero aclarar que TODAS las expansiones son GENIALES, lo que TOCA LA MORAL es la jugada maestra de Blizzard con el anuncio de la expansión LoH ofreciendo el mismo precio de salida para los nuevos jugadores por el que pagué por VoH en su tiempo y ahora no lo puedes adquirir individualmente, ni tan siquiera se dignan a darnos un puñetero DESCUENTO a todos los usuarios que lo tenemos, así que de momento dejo mi voto negativo a la espera que otros jugadores RECAPACITEN sobre este hecho delictivo.
Diablo is my favorite game. Diablo 4 is an amazing addition to the catalogue.

Great game, but it's designed entirely as a money trap. The amount of microtransactions and expansion prices for a game costing €50 is insane.  Edit:  To those who are defending Blizzard: there is nothing to defend here. They are the ones overcharging you; you are the one paying the money. The fact that this kind of monetisation has become the default in the MMORPG genre does not justify what they are doing. If something is wrong, it is wrong. Wherever you encounter this kind of bullsh*t, it is your responsibility to complain and not accept it. Not trying to offend any player here.  I still enjoy the base content, even though I feel left out since I didn't pay extra with every update. I keep playing because I enjoy what I have, but I definitely won’t be paying more under the current conditions.

Good first playthrough experience but after that it's stale. Re-downloaded the game for S11 and got the old Blizzard Gotcha mechanic to pre-order the new expansion to play the Paladin early. How much money do I need to spend to continue playing this game when I can play other ARPG's in the genre with far more content with better dev teams for far less money. Blizzard is a joke. Outside of that this is a great game for players looking to mindlessly bash monsters in and see really big numbers or players with limited time. This game is a gum ball machine. Put your money in, chew on the flavor for a bit and spit it out once the flavor goes dry. Which for me is very quickly.

Diablo 4 est un excellent opus que j'aime beaucoup pour son retour aux sources du hack'n'slash diabolique.  Le système de combat fluide et addictif, avec des classes bien équilibrées et une progression captivante, rend les sessions interminables. L'exploration du monde ouvert sombre et immersif, parsemé de donjons variés, offre une rejouabilité exceptionnelle.​  La campagne principale solide, enrichie par des saisons régulières et des extensions comme Vessel of Hatred, maintient l'intérêt sur le long terme. L'ambiance gothique oppressante et la bande-son épique capturent parfaitement l'essence de la série.

Jeu complet, bien élaboré qui permet de faire évoluer un personnage tout en accomplissant des quêtes bien pensées ! Quand on commence à y jouer, on n'a plus envie de décrocher ... De plus, le détail des images est impressionnant ! Je recommande à 200 % !

А я между прочим был главой гильдии Рыцари Смерти с онлайном в 50 взрослых мужиков, и вот мы долбили Дюриэля до посинения день за днём, в итоге оставив дружно игру на доработку.... Купил комплект игры и Vessel of Hatred на распродаже меньше месяца назад, всё ещё прохожу основной сюжет. А теперь издатель предлагает мне заплатить за комплект с новым DLC в цену которого включена цена старого DLC. Игра про чертей для чертей от чертей 👍  Обновление:  Пройдя игру, дополнение Vessel of Hatred, посмотрев на большую часть механик и контента который предлагает игра, с уверенностью могу сказать лишь одно - это намного лучше чем недоразумение под названием Diablo 3.  Мрачный реалистичный визуал банально лучше справляется с погружением в сеттинг и сюжет о горделивых ангелах, сектантах и кровожадных порождениях ада. Серия игр больше 20 лет жившая одним лишь принципом "бей мобов, собирай лут" доросла до полноценной серой морали в истории, появились настоящие хорошо прописанные персонажи и даже в громадной куче однообразных второстепенных заданий можно найти что-то интересное.  А вот некоторые решения геймдизайна таких хороших впечатлений не оставляют.  Начну хулу с системы сложностей - всё прохождение я поднимал сложность при первой возможности и это привело к тому что мой персонаж достиг максимального уровня уже во втором акте (в основной игре их шесть), я сдувал всех врагов и боссов настолько быстро что не успевал услышать их сюжетные реплики, и это было просто нелепо. После прохождения основной кампании вам дают доступ к ещё 5 уровням сложности, что решает проблему "я хочу больше испытаний", но не решает проблему "я 20 часов не видел достойного противника".  С системой лута случилось примерно то же самое - на 60-м уровне его прогрессия останавливается и до конца основной кампании и перехода на сложность "Истязание 1" вы упрётесь в стеклянный потолок по снаряжению. Забавно, что тогда же пропадёт огромная часть "работы" по переработке и продаже белых-синих-жёлтых шмоток - наверное сделать для этого отдельных галочки в инвентаре (на любой сложности) было бы по мнению разработчиков излишним оказуаливанием.  Я хотел поругать систему закалки снаряжения за неоправданный рандом (добавленное свойство выбиралось из 3-5 разных, в т.ч. бесполезных), который по сути навязывал дополнительный гринд. Но в недавнем обновлении (декабрь 2025), систему закалки ОКАЗУАЛИЛИ (убрали рандом свойств, оставили рандом числа) существенно упростив подгон обновок под желаемый билд. Одновременно с этим появился предмет для ОТКАТА ограничения на ролл закалки. Почему этого не было в игре изначально - вопрос в пустоту.  Вместе с закалкой в недавнем патче зачем-то потрогали награды за изучение локаций, отобрав у игрока заряды хилок больше четырёх, сделав для этого отдельное свойство в снаряжении. [u]А через пару дней это изменение откатили.[/u] Людям которые этим занимались я предложил бы выйти на улицу и потрогать траву, а не механики ОДНОПОЛЬЗОВАТЕЛЬСКОЙ игры вышедшей 2 года назад.  Итогов не будет - у меня нет универсальной оценки этого продукта, как у разработчиков нет понимания хотят ли они доить из игроков донат всеми способами (купи батлпас, купи премиум батлпас, купи скинчики) или хотят чтобы игроки бесплатно гриндили ну точно самый лучший шмот (до патча) сотнями часов.
Купи дополнение, которое зачем-то содержит дополнение, которое у тебя уже есть, за оверпрайс - получи паладина в подарок. Отличная сделка

Diablo 4 : ich lese viel Negatives über Diablo 4...dennoch...spiele ich die Diablo-Reihe seit 2001 und bin immer wieder von der Story und der Entwicklung von Diablo positiv begeistert! :-)  Spielt, dass Game, das euch Spaß macht! Ich habe Spaß an Diablo, Diablo 4. Nun spiele ich, wie wohl viele, den Paladin. Diese Klasse macht mir gerade richtig Spaß!  Die Firmenpolitik von Blizzard ist nicht mehr meines, wie zu früheren Zeiten...doch aus meiner Sicht, läuft Diablo 4 rund und eine interessante Story mit den tollen Zwischensequenzen, mit passender Vertonung.  Für mich ein Spaß zum Abschalten, nach der Arbeit und dem alltäglichen Stress! Und das alles für ein paar Euro! Ein wirklich günstiges und spaßiges Vergnügen, für mich!  An alle Hater: sucht euch ein Spiel, an dem ihr Freude habt, ansonsten wären Games sinnfrei! Wieder meine bescheidene Meinung! Warframe and PoE show how it's done – Diablo fails due to greed  It’s unbelievable when you compare this to the competition:      Warframe: Massive updates have been free for years. Premium currency is earnable in-game.      Fortnite: The game is free. Funded solely by skins.      Path of Exile 2: Full game and all leagues are completely free.  And Diablo 4? You buy the base game at full price. Now a new DLC is releasing, and you have to pay up yet again. Instead of releasing updates for free (like the competition), Blizzard asks for money for every single piece of new content.  On top of that, there's the Battle Pass, the cash shop, and skins costing 25€/$25. Blizzard doesn't seem to understand that you can't have it all. A game I've already paid full price for shouldn't ask me to pay for new content every single time.  If you want to support fair developers, look elsewhere. I'm out.

关于这个游戏，我来说点中肯的评价吧。 首先！学生党，我不推荐玩这个游戏，按照这个游戏的尿性，它更新一个角色就逼你氪金一次，不氪你买的游戏本体就相当于花几十万彩礼娶了一个六十多岁的老太婆回家，看也不好看，玩也不好玩。因为是残缺的，游戏主线剧情直接断层，不知道后面讲些什么。而且dlc动辄大几百，以咱们国内大学生的平均生活费，我可以说它是绝大多数学生无法承担的。 其次！刚上班的牛马不推荐玩！这个游戏想成型很肝，而且需要了解和学习的东西太多了，前期的时间和经济投入成本太高，而游玩体验和投入的成本完全不成比例。并且这个游戏成型后给人的体验感，就是一个2D的无双割草游戏，没有任何的体验感。 综上所述，这个游戏的受众群体，我为数不多能想到的就是：事业有成，又单身未婚，并且工作很清闲的中年大叔，因为这个游戏有种传奇的感觉。。。

Обзор от казуала, для казуалов) Вообще сложно описать словами эту метафизику игр билзард. Я получил от игры тот самый вайб олдовых сюжетных игр начала нулевых, вот эти ламповые синематики, относительно незамысловатый, но цепляющий сюжет, качественная озвучка, музыка, тактильные ощущения от геймплея - все "как раньше", при этом игра комфортная. Не казуальная, а именно дружелюбная для игрока, она не душит, не наказывает за ошибки и уважает наше время.  Да, эта игра, не предложит много контента для любителей зависать надолго в эндгейме, это точно не для поешников, но это однозначно для любителей залипнуть на 30-40 часов бодрой арпг, кайфануть после работы часик-другой, залипнуть пару дней в сезоне тоже бывает занятно. P. S. А еще мне очень понравилось в сезонах, что нас не заставляют каждый раз проходить сюжетку. Новый сезон - новая сюжетная линейка мини-квестов.

(Про цену вообще молчу)  По сути получается, что первое дополнение нужно купить еще раз, хоть и по цене ниже, когда оно вышло, тут сам факт, что у тебя нет выбора и нужно заплатить еще раз, буквально за воздух.  Оно и раньше отношение к DLC было не очень, потому что продают по сути кусок игры, механик и тд, которые и так должны были бы быть в основной версии, но сейчас они превзошли самих себя.

游戏人生的第一个差评，必须给你——《暗黑破坏神IV》！！！  新DLC《憎恨之王》的定价操作，堪称游戏行业商誉崩塌的典型！！！Steam国区坐地起价，大幅上涨，更离谱的是 “买新送旧” 的捆绑策略：新玩家花一份钱能获得 DLC1《憎恨之躯》+DLC2，而我们这些冤种，原价购入 DLC1 的老玩家，想玩新内容仍需全额支付 278 元，相当于为同款旧 DLC 重复买单！！！这么喜欢钱，你怎么不去抢呢？？？  你们无视老玩家的忠诚度与投入。当初为支持游戏首发 DLC，大家真金白银购入《憎恨之躯》，如今却成了被抛弃的 “冤大头”。既无差价返还，也无专属补偿，你们用冰冷的定价规则，碾碎了核心玩家的情怀滤镜。更讽刺的是，DLC1 本身就因 “换皮职业”“恶性 BUG” 饱受诟病，如今免费捆绑却让付费老玩家的权益成了笑话！！！  Steam，你作为发行平台，纵容这种坐地起价、歧视老用户的行为，同样属于臭不要脸！！！从服务器卡顿不解决，到如今的定价双标，暴雪与Steam的一系列操作，早已背离了 “尊重玩家” 的基本准则。  商誉的建立需要数年积累，崩塌却只在朝夕。当情怀被明码标价，当忠诚被肆意消耗，这样的游戏与平台，终将被玩家用脚投票。希望暴雪与Steam正视争议，给老玩家一个合理交代，否则再经典的 IP，也终将在逐利的短视中耗尽所有信任！！！

Вводить новый DLC, который включает в себя старый, стоит как 2 DLC и не даёт скидку игрокам, которые уже купили предыдущий DLC - это максимально скотское отношение. Сейчас самый дорогой пакет стоит 90$. Предлагаете мне купить его, чтобы через год купить ещё один DLC стоимостью 140$, который будует включать те 2, которые я уже купил? А потом ещё DLC за 180$? 220$? Спасибо, не надо. Пойду лучше поиграю в PoE2, в которой тоже вышел новый класс и при этом бесплатные выходные... Eine Blizzard-Ära findet nach jetzigem Stand ein Ende! Als Diablo II- und StarCraft-Jünger bin ich den Blizzard weg immer mitgegangen. Einige Spiele kaufte ich mir 2 oder gar 3mal, da Sie mit der Zeit kaputt gingen (CD´s). Unabhängig davon war es Pflicht für mich diese Spiele zu besitzen. Auch entgegen der Meinung vieler Freunde die bereits mit Diablo III und zuletzt bei Diablo IV das Handtuch schmissen blieb ich am Ball. Als ich gestern Abend und heute morgen vom Update las, freute ich mich schon den PC anzumachen. Was dann geschah war schlichtweg nur noch enttäuschend. Neben neuen Monstern und Effekten die eingefügt wurden und mächtig schaden aus dem nichts verursachten, was dafür sorgen wird, dass unerfahrene Spieler den schlichtweg umfallen werden, wurden auch nach andere Funktionen abgeändert die sich eigentlich positiv auf das Spiel auswirken sollten. Leider tun sie das aber nicht. Denn wenn plötzlich der Widerstand von 75% auf 53,7 % reduziert wird und der Schaden auch fast halbiert wird, Gegenstände nicht mehr beim Okkulisten verzaubert und beim Schmied gehärtet werden können, hat sich das Spiel lediglich verschlechtert. Die Werte die dafür Sorgen sollten sehen zu können, ob man die Stufe schafft sind so unübersichtlich, dass diese keine Verbesserung bringen, sondern das Spiel noch verwirrender machen. Sorry Blizzard, aber ich kann das Spiel beim jetzigen Stand weder empfehlen noch den Menschen raten weiter zu spielen. Ich für meinen Teil werde jedoch an dieser Stelle ebenso wie sehr viele meiner Freunde das Handtuch schmeißen. Vielleicht ließt man ja irgendwann, dass Blizzard wieder innovativ ist und auf die Community hört. Bis dahin wünsche ich euch viel Erfolg und werde davon Abstand nehmen das neue Add On zu erwerben, denn leider macht der Paladin auf den ich mich ebenfalls gefreut habe nicht das Gameplay wett. Goodbye
Mit den jetzigen Update bin zufrieden warum manche Probleme haben verstehe ich Persönlich nicht.

Jemand schrieb auf einem Diablo 4 Discord "Für 2 Wochen am Anfang einer Season ganz nettes Game". Dem kann ich pauschal erst einmal nicht widersprechen.   Jedoch braucht man ohne Vessel of Hatred schon mal gar nicht anfangen, außer man möchte als Vorzeige-Schwächling herumlaufen. Ihr dürft froh sein, wenn Euer Char mit Paragon 250+ auf Qual 4 mühsam klar kommt. Mythische Gegenstände werdet Ihr mit sehr viel Glück vielleicht auch 1-2 in einer Saison zu sehen bekommen, während Besitzer des DLC locker alle 1-2 Tage welche finden können. Runen die Zugang zu mächtigen Klassenübergreifenden Skills bieten und die einfachste und schnellste Geldquelle sind, (und einzige Möglichkeit gezielt Mystische Gegenstände zu farmen) bleiben Euch ohne DLC auch komplett verwehrt.   Und Blizzard wird garantiert alles daran setzen es mit dem nächsten DLC wieder genau so zu machen! Aber keine Sorge, für saftige 40€+ könnt Ihr aktuell immerhin 5 Monate vor Release das Lord of Hared DLC vorbestellen und Zugang zum Pala bekommen, der lächerlich OP ist (und Blizzard wird mit Sicherheit nichts an diesem Verkaufsargument in nächster Zeit ändern). Die Kampagne ist in Diablo 4 so uninteressant und schwach, da wird kein DLC noch irgendwas dran ändern! Dafür aber gleich mal den Vollpreis anderer Games zu verlangen? Einfach nur frech! Vielleicht 5 h Story, 2 neue Klassen und ein paar zusätzliche Events, Mechaniken und Bosse die vielleicht für 10-20€ gerade so klar gehen würden. Aber wie gesagt: Blizzard arbeitet hart daran Euch spüren zu lassen dass Euch ein DLC fehlt!   Freut Euch allgemein auf eine ziemlich langweilige und lieblose Welt, in der man laufend irgendwo hängen bleibt, Bugs an der Tagesordnung sind und Ihr um je ein 4* mythischen Gegenstand zu besitzen vermutlich mehr als meine 1000 Stunden Grinden müsst. Ich hab nämlich aus sicher mehr als 100 mythischen nichts höheres als 2* bekommen. Ich habe schon asiatische MMO's in meinem Leben gezockt die intensiven Grind voraussetzen und quasi bekannt für Ihren beinahe absurden Dauer-Grind sind, aber trotzdem belohnender waren als Diablo 4. Dazu ist der Chat und damit die einzige "offizielle von Blizzard angebotene Möglichkeit" Items zu verkaufen, wirklich der lächerlichste Witz überhaupt! Spieleabstürze? Auf jeden Fall! Lags? Selbstverständlich (und ich habe eine 500er Leitung)! Coole Rüstungs-Skins? Für günstige ~2500 Münzen findet sicher jeder was, aber wenn Euer Char 5 Waffen tragen kann, dann bekommt Ihr natürlich trotzdem nur 2 Waffen-Skins <3   Ihr habt Lust mal wieder an gute alte Zeiten wie in Diablo 2 erinnert zu werden und einfach mal wieder schön entspannt ein geiles Hack'n'Slay zu zocken? Dann installiert Diablo 2... In Diablo 4 findet Ihr mMn nichts davon. Ich habe eher das Gefühl mit Diablo 4 gibt sich Blizzard große Mühe Ubisoft und ähnliche Publisher nachzuahmen. Für mich war es jedenfalls das letzte Diablo!  Nachtrag:   Zu zweit mit einem Kumpel an der Playstation zusammen etwas Zeit totschlagen, dafür kann man sich das Game durchaus mal geben. Aber auch dann nur wenn es entsprechend günstig angeboten wird. Aber da kommt eben auch nur gute Stimmung auf, weil man sich nicht über den Bildschirm-Rand hinaus trennen kann! Am PC, auch mit Discord, verliert man sich halt trotzdem laufend aus den Augen, muss mal "kurz" in die Stadt und, und, und... 虽然我是在12月12日中午12点用steam手机版第一时间就买下的DLC2，只花了168元，到现在也没有退款，但是得知后面涨价到278元以后，我依然要在评论区为暴雪这个骚操作表示不满。 我们买了DLC1的，甚至是第一时间预购的玩家，凭什么要为你这种捆绑DLC1和DLC2销售买单？可别说你DLC2一定要有DLC1才能运行，这是你程序员的锅，你DLC1都能把地图、职业、符文这些功能单独拿出来，怎么DLC2就做不到？ 还有就是steam有一种定价是可以识别玩家是否购买某一个游戏就获得优惠的设定，那我已经有了DLC1的，再买DLC2就可以享受6折优惠（168/278=0.6），你暴雪平台做不到可就别把steam一视同仁。

只能说暴雪为了赚钱已经彻底不要下限了。 前几天还在卖“本体 + DLC1”的打折捆绑包，转头 DLC2 上线，却强制只卖“本体 + DLC1 + DLC2”捆绑包。那请问之前已经买过的人算什么？活该被当冤大头反复割？老玩家反正跑不了，所以怎么恶心都无所谓是吧？这比大数据杀熟更无耻了，赤裸裸地把老玩家当提款机，连演都不演了。  国内外社区骂声一片不是没有原因的。作为预购本体终极版 + 预购 DLC1 终极版的超级大怨种，我一路经历了数不清的恶性 BUG、设计师“教你玩游戏”的逆天改动，换皮的赛季内容，以及挤牙膏一样的更新节奏。直到现在我才终于明白：对现在的暴雪抱有任何期待，都是不切实际的幻想。早点弃坑去玩流放之路2，难道不香吗？  身边的朋友早在 2023 年就陆续 AFK 了，只剩我还在硬撑。现在回头看，只能说醒悟得太晚。  最后劝一句刚入坑的、以及还在犹豫要不要入坑的玩家： 能退款的赶紧退款，不要购买。 就暴雪现在这副“眼睛死死盯着玩家钱包”的吃相，根本不像是想把游戏做好的样子。你今天拿到了一点优惠，但等到 DLC3、DLC4，你照样会经历同样的恶心套路。而且我真的很怀疑暴雪这样搞能拉来多少新玩家。等他发现游玩人数，在线时长没达到他的预期时，逆天操作马上就来，可能你的游戏体验只有一两个赛季。

After playing Diablo since the very first game. I have been a advid fan. Diablo 2 blew my mind away and when Diablo 3 came out, i made sure to be one of the first to get the cd (which i still have).  Diablo 4 came out and i was blown away. i ignored the negative comments and kept enjoying the game. When the expansion came out I was excited. Even though the price was high for a DLC I thought i will support the game that i have spent HOURS, DAYS, MONTHS & YEARS playing. The expansion was such a disappointment wiht how short it was compared to what you paid. Basically, you were only playing for their new character, Which they made OP to get everyone to get the Expansion. Now with the new expansion, They have missed the mark on what their customers want. I was prepared to buy the expansion even thought it is expensive. Only to find that you getting the two expansions. Blizzard, when you have loyal clients, you dont try and milk them out as much as you can. Now wonder POE2 popularity is surpassing you by far. Not only do they understand their clients, they offer updates and additional characters AT NO ADDITIONAL PRICE.  This will be the first time and unfortantely last time i will not be buying the expansion.  They wont see this and I guess they dont care but i hope that this gets seen by someone before they commit to using their well earned money to a company that doesnt care about their clients.

TL;DR: Diablo IV is genuinely fun and captures the dark Diablo atmosphere, but the lack of PC couch co-op forced me to buy it across multiple accounts, and the Age of Hatred bundle offers no fair value to existing Vessel of Hatred owners, making loyal players feel punished for buying early.  --  I love the Diablo series and that absolutely includes Diablo IV. Is it perfect? Of course not. Is it fun? Most certainly. At its core, Diablo IV still delivers what the franchise does best - satisfying combat, rewarding build synergies, and that familiar "just one more run" feeling that keeps pulling you back in.  The darker tone is a welcome return to form. Sanctuary feels bleak, oppressive, and dangerous in a way that leans far closer to Diablo II than III. Combat has real weight behind it, abilities feel impactful, and when a build comes together, the game is at its most enjoyable. There is no denying that Diablo IV understands the fundamentals of why people love this series.  However, there are some frustrating omissions and design decisions that hold it back. One of the biggest for me is the lack of PC couch co-op. Diablo III nailed this on console and became one of the best shared ARPG experiences available. Diablo IV still supports couch co-op, just not on PC. As a result, I now own the game across two Steam accounts and a Blizzard account, simply so I can play co-op with my girlfriend. I do not regret supporting the game, but it is hard not to see this as a completely avoidable workaround caused by a missing feature.  *Edit - Age of Hatred / Vessel of Hatred*  This is where my enjoyment turns into genuine frustration.  I purchased Vessel of Hatred outright, more than once, across multiple platforms and accounts, and yet when the Age of Hatred collection launched, existing owners received nothing of comparable value. No upgrade path. No equivalent cosmetics. No credit. No discount. Nothing.  In practical terms, this means loyal players are effectively being asked to pay for the same DLC twice, while those who waited receive a better value bundle. I am not opposed to bundles existing. They are great for new or returning players. But when those bundles actively undercut previous purchases without any form of parity or recognition, it feels unfair.  This is especially frustrating as someone who has invested in the game multiple times purely to enjoy Diablo the way it has always encouraged - together. At the very least, there should be an upgrade path, partial credit, or some exclusive acknowledgment for existing Vessel of Hatred owners so early support does not feel like a mistake.  I enjoy Diablo IV. I want to keep enjoying it. But decisions like this make it increasingly difficult to justify continued support.  Blizzard really needs to make this make sense.

Do you want to play a pretty solid action rpg with whiplash-inducing endgame movement speed and mobility options that's has solid seasonal content? Do you want to just tear a hole in your wallet at the sight of good-looking cosmetics that the base game which you already paid for just refuses to give you?  If you answered yes to both of these questions, then by all means, go play this crusty, maggot-infested sewer stain of a game and have a meet & greet with the 4th Prime Evil; The Lord of Greed, Activision-Blizzard. Get down on your knees and open those wallet flaps cuz' papa's here to empty you out completely.   I imagine that, for these devs, endlessly cranking out €30 skins to satiate their corporate overlords is little more than an exercise to slowly immerse themselves in, and get used to the environment where they will inevitably all end up: Hell.  And the worst part of all, I'll keep playing this because hidden underneath the truly biblical amounts of greed on display here, there's actually a half decent game.

As a steam deck player, not only does the game take up the entire hard drive for a base model storage steam deck, that being about 130 gigabytes, the newest update adds about 58 more gigabytes to the game, making the game come to almost 200 gigabytes of size. I shouldn't have to delete all my games to just play diablo. And i am not going to purchase an SD card just to put the game onto it.  Additionally, the game is plagued with microtransactions at every turn. The game is playable without buying things, but things like the season pass, skins, and even pets & mounts require a purchase to get a nice skin.  I do feel bad leaving a negative review on the game since it is very fun, and the graphics look great even on steam deck, but I can't even play the game anymore due to that storage issue.

Playing as a Barbarian i think, got maybe 1/3 through the expansion and then the next one drops ruining the story cause the guy contained in the crystal just escapes im assuming, Blizzard wants me to fork out $60 for a prepurchase even though it don't come out for another 5 months, combat is so simple yet they put unneccessary crap behind difficulty layers, such as enemies having a ridiculous amount of hp or hitting you so hard you keep using health potions.  Then the new season comes around and they make it so you have less than half of the health potions you spent hours grinding repititive content for, on top of that your gear is useless as it was "Seasonal" so your forced to refarm for gear all over again and cant even continue into the next season with your current character to experience any new content.  Echo of lilith battle is a disgrace, got down to maybe 20% hp on the second bullcrap phase in the previous season then when the new season comes around cant even get past the first phase because the ground stomp spikes kill you in 1 hit alongside every other little pixel on the screen.  No one playing PVP in PVP zones just endless mobs to grind against with goodie chests, have to constantly go back to town to sell crap or break it down to more useless material since Gold does absolutely nothing in this game and the materials you hardly use.  The Monetisation for this game is by far the worst ive ever seen for any game, you have to buy a 2800 Currency pack for $37.50 the pets themselves cost 2500 currency which means you have to fork out close to $40 AUD for a pet, a stinking pet that just follows you around and does nothing, I thought the $100 Dinosaur Auction house mount in WoW was bad enough but Blizzard continues to show how they don't give a damn about actual value and just want your money.  Speaking of value I got this game alongside the expansion on sale for about $50 AUD total, the expansion area is 1 Tiny new area as part of the map, the base game gives you 5 areas to explore, why would anyone prepurchase the 2nd expansion if its probably just gonna be another tiny square on the map.  I just can't support such a greedy company, they make Disney look good, the true horror in this game is the cash shop, don't get me started on the Token crap that you earn overtime killing enemies then having to pay actual currency to unlock a section of gear/mount/weapons section and hope that you unlock it all in time before it turns a new season.  Then they go ahead and ruin things that were fine such as Helltides no longer having events within them to make it easier to get the currency to open the chests, instead you have to grind useless mobs.  The DIfficulty in this game is ridiculous i play on Torment 1 because theres a huge jump in the time it takes to kill an enemy, not difficult either they can hardly touch or kill me just take another 500% hits before they die on Torment 2, they said they made the game harder for season 11, what they meant was they removed some features from end game content and added new ones like layers of depression to the current bullcrap echos of lilith fight.
Still a buggy, unoptimized mess. Frustrating to play, even on top-end hardware. Removing RNG from Tempers and whatnot is a good change, though.

Scamming Loyal Players — Thanks for Making Us Pay Twice, Blizzard! RNM!Tui Qian! I paid full price for the Vessel of Hatred DLC the moment it dropped—because I believed in this game and wanted to support it. Now? Blizzard is giving that same DLC for free to new players who buy the new expansion. And what do we early adopters get? Nothing.  Want early access to the new Spiritborn (Paladin)? Too bad! You have to buy the Deluxe Edition of the second DLC—which includes the first DLC again. That means I have to pay for Vessel of Hatred TWICE just to get the same perks new players get by waiting!  This isn’t just greedy—it’s a slap in the face to everyone who supported Diablo IV from day one. Blizzard is literally punishing loyalty and rewarding people who waited. If you buy early, you’re a sucker. If you wait, you win.  Congratulations, Blizzard—you’ve turned your biggest fans into your biggest regrets. Never again will I preorder or buy a DLC at launch from you. This isn’t business; it’s betrayal.  1/10 — For making paying customers feel like fools.  Feel free to copy-paste this directly onto Steam. It’s honest, furious, and highlights the core injustice: you’re being forced to rebuy content you already own while new players get it bundled for less.  And if enough players voice this outrage, maybe—just maybe—Blizzard will offer a fair upgrade path. Until then, your voice matters.

Diablo IV feels like Blizzard finally remembered what made this series special. The world is dark, oppressive, and genuinely interesting to explore, and the atmosphere does a lot of heavy lifting. Combat feels great from the start and only gets better as your build comes together — every hit feels impactful, and the classes all have their own identity.  The campaign surprised me the most. It’s actually engaging, well-paced, and Lilith is one of the better villains Diablo has had. Even side quests often have some weight to them instead of feeling like filler. While the endgame still has room to grow, I’ve already gotten more than my money’s worth, and seasonal updates keep pulling me back in.  It’s not perfect, but it’s a strong foundation and easily the most fun I’ve had with Diablo in years.

This is one of the best live service games I have ever played. Подавляющее большинство негативных отзывов считаю необоснованными. Игра постоянно развивается, помимо сезонных механик вводятся различные новые функции.   Нет наслоения механик как в ПоЕ, контент конкретного сезона только в этом сезоне и потом удаляется (за некоторыми исключениями), на самом деле я хотел бы что бы эти механики оставались в игре, но понимаю, что новичку будет очень сложно освоиться, как в первой ПоЕ. Много механик взято из Д3 и они улучшены, есть немало своих фич. Визуал, звук - на высоте, полная русская локализация.  Игру однозначно рекомендую, бодрая ARPG на 60-80ч в каждом сезоне. Играю с 0-ого сезона, ни один не пропустил, на старте каждого сезона ощущается радость как от праздника  Попробуйте [url=https://diablo.trade/] трейд[/url], добавляет еще больше интереса к игре.

Худшая часть серии. Про количество и качество контента сказано уже достаточно , коснемся других проблем.  1.Разбойник- мужская версия персонажа с релиза имеет женскую анимацию ( не исправлено). Нагрудная броня на разбойнике из-за бага отображается с частью штанов, из-за чего мощь тираэля надетая на разбойнике имеет больше декоративных элементов чем на других классах.  2. Наследник духов- ужасная анимация мужской версии персонажа, у женской версии с анимацией все хорошо. Декоративная броня из предыдущих сезонов недоступна для новых классов ( разработчикам плевать что вы за это заплатили)  3. Крестоносец- все нагрудные доспехи имеют отвратный плащ. В том же world of warcraft  есть функция отключения отображения плаща на персонаже, которой пользуется больше половины игроков . Да мне не плевать  как выглядит мой герой.   4. В очередной раз сделали героев в вечном мире не играбельными, переработав систему экипировки и превратив эпохальные предметы которые выбиваются только из боссов в логовах с шансом сто к одному если повезёт. ( Людей играющих 10+ часов в сутки просьба не беспокоить, речь об обычных игроках) 5. Нет возможности трансмогрифицировать меч в топор либо в молот , арбалет в лук.  6. Топ билды из сезона в сезон работают на багах и экплоитах. Вместо балансировки классов разработчики добавляют новые баги.  7. Единственное что в игре стабильно развивается, это внутриигровой магазин, цены в котором значительно выше чем игры категории Б. При том что стоимость самой игры и полное издание каждого аддона стремительно приближается к 100 долларам и выше 8. С момента релиза стоимость боевого пропуска выросла в 2,5 раза с 300 до 800 единиц внутриигровой валюты ( платины ) 9. Для снижения скорости оттока игроков после начала сезона, разработчики замедлили скорость прокачки. Это же проще чем сделать качественный, интересный контент. 10. Система наемников хуже чем в Диабло 3. После тестирования в четвертом сезоне довольно интересного и полезного наемника сенешаля. Разработчики добавили целую команду разнообразных , бесполезных  "помощников" каждый со своей уникальной ,никому не нужной , увлекательной историей . Здесь и однорукий кузнец ,и одержимый ребенок, и психически неуравновешенная женщина каннибал, и охотник обладающий умением отображать противников на мини карте ( самое полезное умение среди прочих )

Игра хорошая, но за ценовую политику с Lord of Hatred ставлю минус. По факту Vissel of Hatred можно было не покупать. Берешь за 40$ DLC, а через год оно входит в новое DLC за 40$. Механически я понимаю данный ход - сюжет и контент накладывается слоями одно DLC на другое. НО откровенно это плевок владельцам Vissel of Hatred, могли бы сделать символическую скидку или эксклюзивный контент, тем кто поддерживает игру на релизе. Я люблю Диабло и купить куплю, но минус поставлю, так как это свинство.   The game is good, but I give it a minus for the pricing policy with Lord of Hatred. Vissel of Hatred was practically unnecessary. You buy the $40 DLC, and a year later it's included in a new $40 DLC. Mechanically, I understand this approach—the plot and content are layered from one DLC to another. BUT, frankly, it's a slap in the face to Vissel of Hatred owners; they could have offered a token discount or exclusive content to those who supported the game at launch. I love Diablo and will buy it, but I'm giving it a minus because it's disgusting. And a special minus to Blizzard.

I played Diablo IV back when it first released in 2023, and at the time - it was a reasonably good approach to the Diablo franchise, but flawed in many ways. Infact, it was flawed enough that I stopped playing it and let the game sit for a couple years. I intermittently came back for Vessel of Hatred, but it didn't really stick. More recently, I've returned to the franchise with the Paladin update, prior to the release of Lord of Hatred and I've been having a blast with the game. While it still doesn't quite scratch the itch of the Diablo II era, it does seem to be in a significantly healthier state and is quite enjoyable. I'd recommend picking it up if you can find it on sale, perhaps still not a full purchase price worthy game, but fun nonetheless and plenty of content to sink your teeth into.

This was the most awful purchase I have ever made. I bought this because of the new Paladin class and ran into so much BS that I genuinely couldn't believe my eyes 1. My own fault, I bought the standard edition because I didn't understand the advertisement - you need to spend $70 and get all expansions in order to play this specific class. 2. After refunding the standard edition and spending $70 on the stupid edition, I am greeted with an account requirement. Not a big deal, but annoying. 3. I am told there is a queue I need to wait in to play Single Player... So I checked the settings to see if I can turn off online mode since I just want to play the story, but no. Not a big deal, but annoying. 4. After playing for an hour, I opened the menu and saw notifications under "SHOP". There I see cosmetics that cost some amounts of a cute mobile game currency. I just spent $70, why am I seeing this? This should be free for me, right? 5. In the same menu, I saw a notification under "whatever-cute-word-for-battle-pass" (I think those were "Reliquaries"). I am greeted with a cute tutorial message telling me there are FOUR Battle Passes, and only ONE is free. That same tutorial message tells me I can BUY a premium-something-or-other to get access to all FOUR Battle Passes, or a deluxe-something-or-other to get access to THREE of the FOUR Battle Passes. 6. I go to the menu and click "Exit Diablo IV" because I couldn't believe what I just saw, and the game crashed ("Diablo IV is not responding")  This is actual mobile game garbage, do not buy it. If you want to play this, play a free mobile game. The graphics were nice and the story seemed cool, hope they make it free-to-play someday as it should be.

I already paid for VoH. Now its bundled into LoH, but to play LoH Im forced to pay again for VoH at the same price? That not fair, that just greedy. This feels like punishing loyal players instead of rewarding them. Too much monetization, Blizzard. Do better. 👎

I waited a couple years to play the game. Figured Paladin would come eventually and here it is.  Played about eight hours on the hardest difficulty I'm allowed to so far.   Monsters can't hurt me and die to my passive aura without me even needing to play the game. All the colors so far are just muted greys, both cash shop and normal game outfits are kind of bland, and it's pretty much constantly pushing me to meta stuff over unlocking it as I do story like most games.   Honestly feels like a mess so far. Maybe it gets better later, I'll see. But even D3 being as hated as it was made me never want to put it down. Here I just kind of log out out of boredom and want to do dailies in my Gachas..

Game itself is average-good. Not bad but not excellent either, not Diablo 2 quality. It's mid-good. Especially the level-design is just boring compared to D2 : very large maps without logic or variations. Characters progression is also weaker. There is still the loot addiction and good quality animations though. This game is lucky to be named Diablo, because with another name, it wouldn't have these sales.  About dlc, you just pay for an early-access to content. I received a support answer from Blizzard confirming that "Indeed, each extension offers the previous ones. There is no discount because buying it earlier simply allows you to have access to the content sooner."  So just wait for the last dlc, and get everything included all at once when the last dlc will release. https://i.postimg.cc/zf2zLNP6/Sans-titre.jpg

After playing PoE 2, it becomes impossible to go back to Diablo 4. D4 has become an ARPG that is far inferior to all the others. Unfortunately, it will never become what D2 and D3 once were. The game has turned more into something about money than about love for the game itself. I’m glad I realized that Diablo 4 isn’t worth it — late, but I finally woke up, and it was the best thing that could have happened. After buying the premium edition of the latest DLC and feeling completely disappointed, I never want to make the same mistake again. The old Blizzard will be deeply missed. :/
its alright, i personally prefer diablo 3, but great community B+

D4 is a great game but there is no reason for it to be an MMO.  The presentation and story / cinematic quality easily better than anything PoE2 could dream up. You could play D4 for the story only and it would be a better value than POE2, the quality is pretty unmatched.   This would have been the best ARPG on the market if it wasn't an MMO, but this is what we are stuck with - having said that, I would still highly recommend D4, the scale and the epic quests you go on are pretty incredible.

All they want is for you to spend more and more money. Buy this edition, buy that edition—buy everything they offer. Yet you still have to pay the full game price to play a new character, even if you already purchased the Ultimate Edition. Blizzard is arguably one of the most shameless and money-hungry companies in the gaming industry.  Let me give an example: in Diablo III, it was possible to obtain many different wings and cosmetics by completing challenges. They felt more unique precisely because you could not simply buy them. In Diablo IV, wings are only accessible through paid options, with no way to earn them through gameplay. These may seem like small details, but back in the day we were grinding like maniacs to get them, and we helped each other as a proper community.  You are not just removing features; you are killing a genre this way. Yes, there are some cool updates and decent optimization in this game, but I am not paid enough to have fun in it—and I know most of us feel the same way.

O jogo tem potencial, só q a Blizzard ultimamente tem cagado na boca de quem é fã da franquia, eles lançam conteúdos porcos e preguiçosos para não dizerem que o jogo está abandonado, se você é fã eu diria que esse jogo é um insulto ao que Diablo representa como franquia e nem em promoção eu recomendo. O evento de 2 anos foi uma skin de cavalo horrível e armas que nem quem fez usaria no próprio personagem, a verdade é que enquanto a blizzard não reformular a equipe que trabalha no diablo e colocar players lá dentro o jogo vai ser um lixo com endgame inexistente e eventos preguiçosos e sem graça. Se você é fã de diablo e busca reviver o sentimento de jogar a franquia eu recomendo o 3 ou tentar aprender a jogar o poe2, esse jogo aqui fede a fracasso! Atualmente não recomendo nem sob tortura, veremos se a avaliação muda com a DLC que será lançada em abril de 2026, até lá poupe seu tempo e dinheiro

У людей бомбит так, как будто они не видели такую же модель продаж (WoW передает привет). Вот так вот один LoH заставил бомбить других LoH'ов. Два явных минуса могу отметить для себя, которые прям не дают мне покоя.  1. Цена. Она тут завышена, если бы речь шла о 12к тенге за базовое издание, это был бы другой разговор. Однако же, ценовая политика в наше время далеко не на стороне игроков. 2. Баланс. И это самое больное. Я любитель разбойника, но как же он валяется в луже 5 сезон подряд. Сначала был наследник духов, который каждый сезон топ 1. Теперь паладин топ 1. Может все таки как то уровнять их? Почему я при прокаченных символах, шмотках, готовом билде на роге еле закрываю 60 портал. При этом качаю паладина за 2 часа до 60 лвл, а потом за те же 2 часа беру 60 яму за 3 минуты. И это еще без готового билда, без вкаченных символов.   По балансу точно что то нужно решать, иначе цена вдвойне не оправдана получается). Однако же, за этими минусами у игры есть огромный плюс. Каждый сезон - разнообразие. Они пересматривают аспекты, добавляют новые уникальные предметы. Соответственно каждый сезон можно сделать какой то новый прикольный билд. ЕСЛИ БЫ НЕ БАЛАНС))).

Отношение разрабов просто жесть, "дайте денег что бы потом мы снова спросили с вас денег". Купи одно дополнение, сделай его Ultimate, а потом забудь что это было, потому что при покупке нового дополнения старое бесплатно, вот это я понимаю отношение к старым игрокам. Просто срань Игра классная, но отношение разрабов убивает все желание играть в неё. Такое ощущение что в отделе маркетинга у Blizzard Entertainment, Inc. сидит мышь, которая таким образом рекламирует PoE2.

класс. зачем я покупала прошлое  длц, если теперь его дают бесплатно ко второму? может хотя бы старым игрокам скидка будет? а то покупать новое теперь явно не хочется. зачем его покупать, если в след длц можно будет и это тоже за так получить?)))  и кстати, за ультимативное дополнение вы получите отличную возможность купить новое дополнение за те же деньги. хотя в других играх за ультимэйт эдишн дают дополнения бесплатно.  это реально плевок в сторону тех, кто покупал первое  длц на момент его выхода. игра замечательная, но из-за такого "крутого" метода продажи нового длц я не рекомендую это игру  я искренне люблю диабло, но идите в жопу с таким отношением к старым игрокам  отличная реклама ПоЕ, близзы))  П.С. те кто пишет про "вы не видели в ВоВ такое же с дополнениями", вы ок, ребят? причем тут ВоВ? да и в принципе такое поведение разрабов не ок. если вы знали, что так будет и купили сознательно, поздравляю LoH тут вы, а дополнение.  дело не в цене (все знали, что близы дорогие), а в отношении к тем, кто уже поддержал игру кошельком. новым игрокам то все норм будет))

Been playing this in Blizzard App for years since LAUNCH. I played Diablo I, Diablo II, Diablo II-R, Diablo 3 and now this Diablo IV.  I bought it on Steam because of the Paladin release and so that I can play it both in my Gaming Laptop and Steam Deck with convenience. 100% would recommend!

An unfinished, unsatisfying and continuously reworked testament to mediocrity. Lacks coherent gameplay loops, effectively has no endgame. skilltrees are extremely limited, builds are even more limited. any build you like will be the victim of a rework to a core system, which happens so often that it feels like you're being gaslit. no GR pushing or equivalent. nothin'.  mission/event design is a step worse than diablo 3. this is most evident in the story missions, which are even more basic than those in previous titles. bossfights are so unmemorable I can't remember their names.   42GBP base price for a 20 hour campaign and no playable endgame experience.  overall this is one step forward in visual presentation, and ten steps back in every other category. there's perhaps a good game lost in this tediously confused mess of amateurism, but blizzard no longer have the skilled staff required to find it.

Consider a game where the price increases by $50-60 with every update. If you want to join events or boost your character, you are required to spend $50-60 each season to access the full experience. This is a clear example of a P2W.

As a casual Diablo fan, I really enjoy the game whenever I come back to check out the newly added features. I play casually and I usually return only when I hear a season is good. I tend to reach Paragon but never fully max out, and I mostly focus on the available activities and quests. Overall, it’s a fun and positive experience.

Here's the deal:  1. If you were a fan of Diablo 1/2 and you thought about playing it for the story - forget about it. The story is crap and modern Blizzard is incapable of re-creating what made the series great. The game has also been designed from the ground up with GAAS / Living Game and microtransactions in mind, you have to understand the whole design of all the systems is made to make you continue playing and spending money if you do not want to aimlessly grind your time away. 2. With the announcement of the second expansion Blizzard has pay-gated the first one (Vessel of Hatred) which was regularly on sale for sub-20€, going as low as 9.99€ last time it was on sale. The only way to get it now is to buy the new expansion at a base price of 39.99€.  Look at your backlog, look at all the other games - there is no reason to support such poor quality of a game in a great series and bad business practices. Watch the plot on YouTube, vote with your wallet, put your money elsewhere.

The game is fun and constantly improving, but Blizzard predatory actions take a toll on the overall experience and I can't recommend the game as of now.    You could just get the next expansion and get 2 expansions for the price of 1, loyal players who bought VoH are being scammed if they buy LoH.  Blizzard runs the game like a F2P live-service, where all of the cool cosmetics are locked behind quite expensive microtransactions (25 dollars for a skin). They need to give better and faster ways for players to farm Cosmetics. The recently introduced reliquary system was a step in that direction, but 200 platinum coins per season is too little if the skins cost 2800. I only need 14 seasons to buy a skin :) That will only take me 5 years! How nice of them! sigh.. Not even F2P games are that level of scummy.  I can't recommend the game for anyone until they adress these issues.

The graphics and sounds are top notch as is the atmosphere of the game, BUT the campaign can be too easy. I like to play single player campaigns and this game was way too easy after couple of hours when I got some legendary gear. Fortunately it's possible to change the difficulty to Expert pretty soon, but can't go over that until campaign over. If you have any experience in Diablo I'd recommend change the difficulty to highest possible when you get the chance. In expert level it gives at least some level of challenge and you need at least dodge a bit or use barrier. With the lower difficulties(normal, hard) you barely needed to move just hold down hit button. I definitely feel that Diablo 3 was more challenging for single player campaign. So recommendation, but with a grain of salt.

The game is a great casual ARPG that you can jump in and out of with little consequence but still has a very satisfying progression and the gear grind is especially good as of Season 11.  Yes there are microtransactions but they are entirely cosmetic and optional, if you hate the game because of that I think you should just play the game and ignore the fluff.

I love this game, but the business model behind it is RIDICULOUS! The idea that all this armor, mounts, pets, portals, etc.... Which used to be things you earned in game for free are now behind a HUGE ($20+) paywall is INSANE! Then they want $40 for each expansion on top of that. Diablo 3 was so generous with their content and their pricing I would have easily and quickly bought an Ultimate Edition or something similar to support development. But Diablo IV is constantly trying to squeeze every penny out of the player they possibly can. Also, even in 2025, there are issues with their crappy always online implementation. These organic interactions with players are almost never worth the squeeze of requiring the game to always be online. There should never be a time when my game slows down or crashes just because there are too many people on a server. In Diablo 3 once we got out of the first year or two, it was almost invisible that the game was always online. I have played many hours of Diablo 3 and 4. But I've never purchased any microtransactions and I never will. I will also never pay full price for these $40 expansions. Know what you are getting into when you sign up. Also. once you get beyond the campaign for Diablo IV there is very little variance in quest or boss style. Even into Vessel of Hatred. Blizzard seems more interested in making money at this point than making an excellent game.

Nowhere near as fun as PoE2 but it is still a fun game that is not only improved since vanilla but is slowly adding more content. Ill say the druid class is my favourite as always but I kind of feel like they did him dirty. If you have to pick between this or the unfinished PoE2, it only depends on if you are up for a challenge. Diablo IV is a much more relaxed pressure free game with a slew of content and an open world map. While PoE2 offers punishing and fast gameplay, open zones with an absolute slew of content and character build crafting that almost feels endless. I would also say PoE2 has a more robust, rewarding and  progressively harder end game.  If you are new to Iso ARPG's or are not "hard core" I highly suggest you pick this game up instead. other suggestions below that will be noob friendly and teach you how these games are played.  -The Last Epoch -Grim Dawn -Vanhelsing

I started playing in Season 9, and now I'm playing Season 11, and I honestly can't recommend the game, because it still has severe bugs after all this time, making bosses invicible, portals to bossfights not spawning at all, and potentially losing loot because you get teleported out of specific dungeons after defeating a boss - possibly this loot is sent to the chest, but not sure if that's all, and it even has a 10-item limit.  Yes, this is all more late-game related, but besides the story, that's probably the majority of the game. The story itself is mediocre and full out hateable characters or characters making all the wrong decisions possible (I guess it wouldn't be a diablo game otherwise)  Some recent features seem to try to simulate Path of Exile, so maybe just play that instead.  Also, it's often quite laggy - it uses way too much RAM on PC. When playing on Playstation, I once had troubles with my connection, and even though the game is ONLINE, I lost 10-20 minutes of progress once because I got disconnected.  For an AAA-Publisher/Developer, all this are fatal points this later after release.

나중에 확장팩 나올거 다 나오면 하시는 걸 추천합니다 이번에 확장팩 증오의 군주에 증오의 그릇을 포함시켜서 파는데 전에 증오의 그릇을 샀던 사람은 증오의 군주만 살 수가 없어요.  즉, 증오의 그릇 있는 분도 증오의 그릇 포함 된 가격으로 증오의 군주를 사야합니다. 그래서 어떤 앞으로 어떤 통수를 당하게 될지 모르기 때문에 나중에 하시는걸 추천드리고  게임면에서는 몬스터도 다양하지도 않아서 봤던 몬스터 또 잡고, 또 잡고 반복에 던전도 비슷비슷하게 생겨서 지겨웠습니다  또 세트 아이템도 없고, 전설 아이템 옵션도 다양하지가 않았어요 그래서 나중에 확장팩이 전부 나온 시점에서 하시는걸 추천 드려요  하지만, 모여있는 몬스터 한번에 녹이고 그런 시원시원함은 있더라구요 스킬 찍은것도 언제나 되돌릴 수 있기 때문에 부담없이 찍을 수 있는 점두 좋았구요 장점도 있지만 그걸 단점을 감싸주진 못하더라구요  파밍게임 좋아하시고 반복사냥에 거부감이 없으시면 나쁘지 않은 게임이겠지만,  저 처럼 반복되는걸 잘 못 참고 스토리 보는 재미를 중요하게 생각하신다면 비추천 합니다.

dlc2里面包含dlc1，已经有dlc1的玩家买dlc2却没有一点减免相当于老玩家平白无故为了dlc1花了两次钱，但是新玩家能488美美拿下本体加两个dlc。 DLC2 includes DLC1, but players who already own DLC1 pay full price for DLC2 without any discount, effectively forcing long-time players to pay twice for DLC1. In contrast, new players can purchase the base game plus both DLCs for just $488.

Когда я был совсем маленький с кудрявой головой серия игр Diablo ускользнула от моего геймерского взора. Мы тогда с друзьями играли в Sacred и ничего другого нам не нужно было. Но годы шли, волосы выпрямлялись и начинали выпадать, а ностальгия по тем временам лишь усиливалась. Порой я открывал страничку Sacred в Steam, но при виде картофельной графики и отсутствия ачивментов желание "тряхнуть стариной" как-то угасало. И вдруг я увидел на новогодней распродаже Diablo 4 и решил ознакомится с данной серией и закрыть для себя эту главу. Буду краток - да, это Sacred на максималках. Это именно та игра которой мне не хватало все эти годы: Сюжетка, количество врагов, торговля, подземелья, огромная карта и куча разных классов и вариантов прокачки персонажа - все сделано так как надо, чтобы затянуть вас в мир Санктуария на долгие десятки часов. И большая часть этого времени - это нереальный кайф. Ставлю 8,5 Лилит из 10 и скажу спасибо за проведенное тут время Blizzard :)

Easily, if not the greatest cinematic ever in the gaming history, one cinematic stands out as a masterpiece and elevates the entire story. The narrative was strong from the very beginning (at least in my case, it kept me completely hooked), but this final cinematic takes it to another level.   The emotional play and fight between Inarius and Lilith, as well as their armies clashing in Hell, pure art. They nailed it with Lilith's character, but every detail is exceptional, the dialogues, the soundtrack, the raw emotions, everything is just perfect.

Diablo 4 ist für mich das perfekte Beispiel dafür, was im modernen Gaming schiefläuft: immer mehr, immer schneller, immer bunter – und das alles hübsch verpackt und angefeuert von Influencern/Content Creatorn.  Vielleicht liegt’s ja an mir, aber für mich ist das Spiel mit der Zeit immer belangloser und langweiliger geworden. Season 11 setzt dem die Krone auf: Nach 2 Tagen auf Qual 4, nach 3 Tagen die Saisonreise abgeschlossen und nach 4 Tagen Paragon 250. Und ich rede hier von Wochentagen, nicht von reiner Spielzeit – die lag bei knapp 16 Stunden. Jetzt das Gear noch weiter leveln? Wofür denn? Damit ich mich im Turm auf der Rangliste mit Studenten oder dem arbeitslosen Teil der Bevölkerung battlen kann? Nein danke.  Da mich die Diablo-Reihe schon seit der PS1 begleitet, habe ich wirklich versucht, dem Spiel treu zu bleiben. Nach der Lasershow, die Diablo 3 abgeliefert hat, habe ich mich wieder auf ein düsteres Setting gefreut. Leider ist davon kaum noch etwas übrig. Ich sehe nicht mal mehr die Monster, die ich töte, weil der Blick permanent auf der Minimap klebt – nur damit ich mit meinem Spint durch den Dungeon nicht aus Versehen hängen bleibe und Sekunden verliere.  Im Grunde könnten sie das Leveln von 1–60 auch komplett rauspatchen. Im aktuellen Zustand ist das nichts weiter als ein Spießrutenlauf, durch den man sich quält, um endlich Items zu bekommen, die nicht nach 10 Minuten wieder ihren Wert verlieren.  Diablo hat mal durch Atmosphäre gefesselt. Heute ist es nur noch eine schillernde Hetze, um die letzten 5% aus jedem Item zu quetschen – ohne irgendwas von der Spielwelt wahrzunehmen, während man zur Ablenkung mit zig bunten Belohnungen zugeschmissen wird.
Deckard, kehren Sie zum Lager der Jägerin zurück!

Dieses Game ist maximaler Rotz, einfach keinerlei Erklärung in den zusätzlichen Inhalten wie man mit Item XY wieder zurück auf die vorherige Ebene kommt und dann stirbt man richtig unnötig. Die Animationen teilweise, einfach nur Bodenlos schlecht, Mobs erscheinen einfach, man hat sich nicht mal ein wenig Mühe gemacht um sich zu überlegen wie könnten die Monster dem Spieler auflauern oder ähnliches. Es einfach gewohnt schlechte Qualität die man von Blizzard und Activision zu erwarten hat.

Já deixo avisado que o jogo pode até ser legal, mas se eles lançarem uma nova expansão, eles vão dar de graça as expansões anteriores e lhe cobrar pela nova, sendo que você pagou para ter as anteriores, e não vão lhe dar desconto, se você for comprar a DLC atual, ou seja, é só um sistema para lhe arrancar dinheiro. Se deseja jogar Diablo IV, a recomendação é que aguarde até o jogo não tem mais lançamento de DLC, dai poderá comprar a última com todas DLC's anteriores inclusas e pagando apenas pela última. Afinal, você não receberá descontos, mesmo já tendo o jogo e as DLC's anteriores. Mas é só uma dica mesmo. Agora se você é rico, ou muito burro, compre todas que eles lançarem, pois é assim que tomam seu dinheiro.

Ой, как же приятно играть в премиальную AAA-игру, прямо оторваться не могу. Играется ну как по маслу: левелинг, гиринг, эксплоринг, эндгейм — ну ультра-вкуснятина, особенно после бесплатных аналогов. Ну оно и немудрено, ведь игра делалась для людей, которые ценят своё время, для успешных бизнесменов, которые хотят после трудного бизнесового дня зайти, качнуть пару левелов, найти шмоточку получше и сразу увидеть результат своих трудов, а не, как додик, фармить два дня по 16 часов штаны с правильными дырками правильного цвета.  Вонючка скажет: «Ой, ну конечно, игра платная, так ещё и донатный магазин прикрутили, ну прогрев гоев полный, их на деньги разводят, а они и рады», на что я нищукам отвечу: «Малыш, в моей премиальной игре благородные господа могут себе позволить купить великолепно сделанный скинчик для своего любимого класса, и их карман от этого не оскудеет. При этом невероятный донатный скинчик никак не помешает мне и другим игрокам наслаждаться игрой, ведь он не даёт никаких преимуществ, только добавляет свэга». Да и что говорить, если именитые разработчики могут себе позволить ивенты-коллаборации с великими произведениями — к примеру, с легендарной гей-мангой «Берсерк» и очень популярной азиатской кибердисциплиной Starcraft, в то время как любители платных вкладок инвентаря не могут заколлабить даже с такими банальными вещами, как душ и мыло.  Отличное продолжение культовой серии: уже на релизе игра отличалась большим количеством нововведений в жанре и спустя годы продолжает их развивать. Система развития в игре крайне удобная и дружелюбная к игрокам: предметы можно перековывать, характеристики перекручивать, да и в целом элемент случайности при выпадении предметов можно скорректировать при помощи расходников. Навыки и парагоны персонажа можно перераспределить в любой момент; если вы хотите попробовать другую сборку для вашего класса, вам не нужно создавать для этого нового персонажа. В игре присутствует система кешбэка ключей: выполняя любые активности, вы будете получать в небольших количествах ключи для других активностей, что подталкивает вас к постоянной ротации занятий, и вам вовсе не обязательно ковырять одни и те же режимы 24/7.  Кстати про режимы: на всех стадиях прогрессии у вас будет множество вариантов занятий, в целом в игре десятки активностей, и каждая предоставит вам персональный опыт. У каждой свой пул наград, есть из чего выбрать, и если один режим наскучил, то можно поиграть в иной, притом прокачка не прекратится. Отдельно хочу отметить рейд-боссов и события легиона — ой, ну просто кино! Смотреть, как на локацию ивента прибывают всё новые и новые игроки, слезают со своих ездовых животных... В ожидании босса вы садитесь у костра и начинаете знакомиться, смотрите билды и косметические элементы друг друга. Если вы играете в одиночку, то вас будут приглашать в группы, и после ивента вы можете продолжить исследовать мир вместе. Рейд-боссы — это эпик: огромные, сильные, многофазовые, у каждого свои геймплейные особенности. Само сражение длится от пары до десятка минут, и далеко не факт, что вы окажетесь победителем.  Ну и представьте себе, что в игре подобного жанра можно сделать интересную сюжетную кампанию — ну где вы такое видели? Или саундтрек, сделанный не за банку пива бомжами из саундклауда. А графика — ну любо-дорого смотреть, даже игры подобного жанра 2025 года не в состоянии составить конкуренцию.  Из недостатков могу только отметить редкие проблемы с переключениями лобби и повышение в связи с этим пинга. Видите ли, в игре огромный бесшовный мир (за исключением подземелий), и, перемещаясь по миру, вы постоянно будете покидать одни и присоединяться к другим онлайн-сессиям. Притом сделано это незаметно, на лету, но, к сожалению, некоторые игроки с проблемным интернетом могут негативно влиять на всё лобби, что приводит к повышению пинга.  А так, если вы решитесь пересесть с F2P-помоев на AAA-премиальное развлечение, если сможете позволить выделить из своих нищих карманов деньги и впервые порадовать себя качественным продуктом — тогда добро пожаловать в мир Diablo 4.

Joguei desde o pré-lançamento, naquela época realmente era quebrado, incompleto e cheio de bugs, era terrível, contudo desde a season 2 com sinceridade acredito que a maior parte das críticas são bombing reviews devido a questões da Blizzard externas ao jogo. Prefiro o Diablo 2 Ressurected e até gostaria que lançassem ele na Steam também, contudo o Diablo 4 também está me garantindo um bom divertimento. Minha única crítica atualmente nesta season 11 é em relação ao sistema de defesas que é muito ruim, prefiro sistemas similares ao Diablo 2 com limites nas resistências, ganhos diminuídos funciona bem com Magic Find, já que não existe essa mecânica no Diablo 4, não creio que devam utilizar ganhos diminuídos, é só simplesmente colocar um limite.
Recomendo.

A temporada 11 é uma porcaria. Joguei todas as temporadas e estou surpreso com o regresso e péssimas decisões. Nenhum conteúdo adicional decente, regresso em relação a temporada passada e novas mecânicas horríveis. Espadas caindo do céu, mil explosões explosões de fogo brotando do chão e outras explosões de veneno saindo da do além, tudo ao mesmo tempo. Dificuldade e inconveniência são coisas diferentes. Se a próxima temporada melhorar e tiver realmente um combate desafiador e monstros com IA melhorada como foi dito, no lugar de ficarem me bazucando do além com mil explosões, eu mudo minha avaliação. Joguei todas as temporadas e tenho muitas horas de jogo, to incrédulo com o que fizeram.
